steps.description: Navigate to the homepage of the website to start exploring.
Click on the 'About Me' link to begin exploring the site, starting with personal information.
Return to the homepage after exploring the 'About Me' section.
Click on the 'Projects' link to explore the projects section of the website.
Return to the homepage after exploring the 'Projects' section.
Click on the 'Contact' link to explore the contact information section of the website.
